sentence.Network_en: The fossil fuels (coal and oil) are finite resources.
sentence.Network_cn: 化石燃料（如煤和石油）属于有限资源。

sentence.Network_en: The physical universe is finite in space and time.
sentence.Network_cn: 物质世界在时间和空间上是有限的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...大于所有有限数、仍不必定绝对无限的基数或序数(简单来说就是代表实无穷的数)术语(超限)(transfinite)是康托尔提出的(他希望避免词语无限(infinite)和那些只不过不是有限(finite)的那些对象有关的某些暗含)对于有限数(有两种方式考虑超限数)作为基数和作为序数(不象有限基数和序数)超限基数和超限序数定义了不同类别的数(最小超限序数是ω.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... finance n 资金，财政 finite a 有限的 infinite a 无限的.
大学英语六级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... finance vt． 供资金给；筹措资金 finite adj． 有限的， [数] 有穷的， 限定的 fireplace n． 壁炉.
英语六级词汇(新大纲) ... feminine/ 5feminin/a. 女性的；女子气的 finite/ 5fainait/a. 有限的；有尽的 fist/ fist/n. 拳(头).

list.abs: ...ation），无空间、时间和人群范围的限制，其观测单位的全体数只是理论上存在，可理解为目标人群。② 有限总体（finite population），限定于特定的空间、时间与人群范围内的有限个观测单位，可理解为研究人群。总体内个体数值的分布称为总体.
分别是：限定动词（finite verb）、非限定动词（non-finite verb）例如：　　she sings very well.　　她唱得很好。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin finitus 'finished', past participle of finire (see finish)

entry.def: Something that is finite has a definite fixed size or extent.

example.ex: Only a finite number of situations can arise...
example.tran: 只有有限的几种情况可能会发生。

entry.def: A finite clause is a clause based on a verb group which indicates tense, such as 'went', 'is waiting', or 'will be found', rather than on an infinitive or a participle.

means.word_mean: 1. bounded or limited in magnitude or spatial or temporal extent
2. of verbs; relating to forms of the verb that are limited in time by a tense and (usually) show agreement with number and person

auth_sentence.content: Oil is a finite resource, just like gold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oil is a finite resource, just like gold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oil is a finite resource, just like gold.

auth_sentence.content: Fossil fuels are finite, and rapidly being depleted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fossil fuels are finite, and rapidly being depleted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fossil fuels are finite, and rapidly being depleted.

auth_sentence.content: Sharing a house with friends has a finite shelf-life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sharing a house with friends has a finite shelf-life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sharing a house with friends has a finite shelf-life.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ite……的→adj.明确的, 一定的
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ite……的→adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
af一再+fin界限+ity表名词→进入范围内→密切关系

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ale表示音乐类→终曲
final[adj.最后的,最终的]+ity表名词→n.结尾,定局,终结
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+itude状态→n.有限
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ity表名词→n.有限, 限定
in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ance表名词→最后起作用的东西→资金
fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]

Sentence.sentence: One key issue is how to produce more food in a world of finite resources.
However, pressure will grow on finite resources of land, energy and water
The predicted global population growth means that ways have to be found to produce more food with finite resources.

sentences.en: These are the finite forms of a verb.
sentences.cn: 这些是一个动词的限定形式。

jushi.english: These are the finite forms of a verb.
jushi.chinese: 这些是一个动词的限定形式。

jushi.english: The audience of this concert is a finite body.
jushi.chinese: 这场音乐会的听众人数有限。
